item.title: Gail add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Gail add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Gail add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Gail add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gail add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Gail add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Gail add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Gail add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Gail add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Gail add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Gail add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Gail add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Gail add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Gail add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Gail add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Gail add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Gail add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gail add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gail add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I am the Lorax. I speak for the trees. I speak for the trees for the trees have no tongues." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gail add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Gail add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Gail add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "My fault, my failure, is not in the passions I have, but in my lack of control of them." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Gail add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before." -- Mae West

item.title: Gail add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "When I'm good, I'm very good, but when I'm bad, I'm better. " -- Mae West

item.title: Gail add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon
